item.title: HandyCalc Privacy Policy
item.description: A description of HandyCalc privacy policy.
item.content:encoded:
HandyCalc Privacy Policy

Data Privacy

We don't store or share any of the content you create in the app.

User Privacy

We do not sell, trade, or transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information. We do not store, collect, distribute any personal information by this app.

Advertising SDK

We use google AdMob SDK to show the advertisements in the app.

item.title: HandyCalc
item.content:encoded:
HandyCalc

HandyCalc is a light calculator app which makes the calculation easier.

Features:

  • Display the input records, so you can make sure your input is correct.
  • Undo the input, if you make a mistake, you can easily undo and redo what you want, even if you have enter the "="
  • The app support iOS, iPad and Mac
